content.rendered:
BCN3D Sigma R19 FDM 3D Printer

The BCN3D Sigma R19 is a reliable and easy-to-use desktop 3D Printer with and Independent Dual Extruder System that delivers high-resolution multi-material parts in a simple and effective way.

contact us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent St,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

Send a Message

    Are you uploading files larger than 5mb?
    Upload Large File

    Do you want a quote based on your STL?
    Instant Quote Calculator


    (Accepted filetypes: pdf,jpg,jpeg,png & gif. Max file size: 5mb)

    A new standard

    The unique Independent Dual Extruder system allows to print 2 different materials or colours while ensures the finest surface finish. The idle toolhead remains parked, preventing the dripping of molten plastic onto the part.

    You choose: multimaterial or multicolor

    Create functional parts by combining the properties of two different materials, like rigid and flexible filaments. Or make your designs more attractive by printing with two colours.

    Print further, print soluble supports

    Avoid geometric limitations and print the most challenging parts thanks to soluble supports. Just immerse the model into water and watch the supports vanish.

    Boost your productivity

    The Sigma R19 features two new highly productive printing modes thanks to its IDEX system.

    Duplication mode

    Print the same model with both toolheads simultaneously and double the printing capacity.

    Mirror mode

    Print the model and its symmetrical part at once, increasing iteration speed and shortening design times.

    Unmatched performance

    Renewed extrusion system optimized and manufactured by global specialists: e3D™ and Bondtech™.

    Such a big family

    The new Sigma hotends have been carefully redesigned by e3D™ to deliver the smoothest and most reliable extrusion than ever before. Add the Hotend Family and enjoy a suitable hotend for each moment: print either the tiniest or the biggest model.

    Extrusion Muscle

    The Sigma extruder features high-tech dual drive gears by Bondtech™, offering more control, sharper details and a superior performance, no matter the filament used.

    Engineered for reliability

    Filament Runout Sensor

    Simple yet reliable. Save time and money increasing the success printing rate.

    BCN3D Filaments

    Industrial-grade materials portfolio designed to deliver outstanding results with versatility in mind.

    Feel the touch

    Operate flawlessly the Sigma via its full colour touchscreen. The attractive and intuitive interface is fully equipped with advanced features that guides the user step by step.

    BCN3D Sigma Enclosure

    (Optional add-on)

    Constant interior temperature: Avoid warping when printing with technical materials.

    HEPA Filter: Protect your working environment from potentially harmful particles.

    BCN3D Cura The best slicer for the most versatile 3D Printer

    Easy-to-use 3D printing software that prepares your digital model for 3D printing. It includes custom functionalities to enhance the user experience and ease the printing process.

    BCN3D SIGMA R19 Specifications

    Physical Dimensions
    General dimensions 465mm x 440mm x 680mm (including cables)
    Weight 15kg (without filament spools)
    Shipping box dimensions 550mm x 570mm x 674mm
    Shipping weight 21kg
    Printer Properties
    Architecture IDEX
    Technology Fused Filament Fabrication
    Build Volume 210mm x 297mm x 210mm
    Number of extruders 2
    Nozzle diameter The Sigma has mounted two 0.4mm hotendsCompatibility with BCN3D hotends 0.3 / 0.4 / 0.5 / 0.6 / 0.8 / 1mm
    Heated Bed PCB
    Screen Full Color Capacitive Touchscreen
    Connectivity SD Card (autonomous)
    USB
    Electronics BCN3D Electronics v1.0
    Independent Stepper Drivers
    Firmware BCN3D Sigma – Marlin
    Supported files gcode
    Operating Sound 50 dBA
    Certifications CE
    FCC
    Filament diameter 2.85 ± 0.05 mm
    Warranty 2 years for EU countries. 1 year for for non-EU countries
    Extruder system Extruder: Bondtech high-tech dual drive gears
    Hotends: Optimized and manufactured by e3D
    Printing Modes Simple
    Dual – IDEX
    Duplication
    Mirror
    Printing Properties
    Layer height 0,05 – 0,5mm (depending on the nozzle diameter)
    Positioning resolution (X/Y/Z) 12,5 µm / 12,5 µm / 1 µm
    Operating temperature 15°C – 35°C
    Extruder maximum temperature 290°C
    Extruder maximum printing temperature 280°C
    Heated bed maximum temperature 100°C
    Materials
    Compatible Materials PLA / ABS / Nylon / PET-G / TPU / PVA / Composites / OthersThe Sigma accepts filaments from other manufacturers.However, it is recommended the use of BCN3D Filaments to obtain the best results.
    Software
    File preparation software Recommended: BCN3D Cura
    Compatible: Slic3r, Simplify3D, …
    Operating Systems Windows, Mac, Linux
    Supported files STL, OBJ, AMF
    Electrical Properties
    Input AC 84-240V, AC 3,6-1,3A, 50-60Hz
    Output 24V DC, 13A
    Power Consumption 240W

    BCN3D 3D Printers

    • BCN3D Sigma R19
      The BCN3D Sigma R19 is a reliable and easy-to-use desktop 3D Printer with and Independent Dual Extruder...
      Read More
    • BCN3D Sigmax R19
      The BCN3D Sigmax R19 is a professional 3D printer with Independent Dual Extruder and a massive printing...
      Read More

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of 3D printing professionals are just an email or a phone call away.

    contact us

    Phone

    03 9687 8638

    Address

    7A Kent St,
    Yarraville, VIC 3013
    Australia.
